thread.title: Ask for Anurachal Pradesh (Pemakod) PAP for Vietnamese
thread.title_full: Ask for Anurachal Pradesh (Pemakod) PAP for Vietnamese

author: pemachoedon
title: Ask for Anurachal Pradesh (Pemakod) PAP for Vietnamese
text: # 1 Namaskar Brothers and Sisters there, I am Vietnamese and I wish to stay two months only in Pemakod, Anurachal Pradesh with my Guru from December 2015 to February 2016. I am writing here for help to get Pemakod PAD during this time, may I receive your guides and help ? i wish to receive your guide and asist as soon as possible With many thanks from the bottom of my heart _()_ Pema Choedon from Vietnam.
